title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: Nil Introduction to programming languages; basic numerical analysis: solution of nonlinear equations using Newton-Raphson method, solution of linear systems using Gaussian elimination and pivoting, interpolation and polynomial approximation, numerical solution of differential equations: ODE and PDE: analysis of convergence, stability and consistency; numerical integration; code development and use of commercially available software to perform simple quantum chemical calculations. Book: Computational Chemistry Using the PC, D.W. Rogers.
